Articles.Content:
Ok, so it was 10:29 P.M, and I was looking at Cassini FlyBys, when it hit me;

Why not make a Calander (with alerts) on my IPod!

So, I go to Wikipedia (of course) and find all Deep Space Events, Launches and the like, get their dates, and put it into the Calander.

And now it is 11:35...

Wow
Wow, I made a calender like that too a while ago, except it's on paper! It's worth it, believe me, it's a lot of fun to see all this stuff!

Wow, I made a calender like that too a while ago, except it's on paper! It's worth it, believe me, it's a lot of fun to see all this stuff!

Yes!

I can't wait for the October 28 Enceladus FlyBy!
